meanings.definition: Relating to a sector or sectors.
meanings.sent1: The company's sectorial growth strategy focused on expanding its market share in specific industries.
meanings.sent2: The sectorial analysis showed that the technology sector was the most profitable.
meanings.sent3: The sectorial approach to organizing the event ensured that each industry had its own designated area.
meanings.sent4: Her sectorial expertise in finance made her the go-to person for investment advice.
meanings.sent5: The sectorial boundaries were clearly defined to avoid any confusion.

meanings.sent1: The sectorial map of the city highlighted the different zones for residential and commercial areas.
meanings.sent2: The sectorial division of labor ensured that each team focused on a specific aspect of the project.
meanings.sent3: The sectorial layout of the garden separated the flowers from the vegetables.
meanings.sent4: The sectorial breakdown of the report categorized the findings into distinct sections.
meanings.sent5: The sectorial boundaries were clearly defined to avoid any confusion.

meanings.definition: Involving or relating to a particular sector.
meanings.sent1: Her sectorial expertise in healthcare made her a valuable asset to the medical team.
meanings.sent2: The sectorial approach to marketing targeted specific customer groups for better engagement.
meanings.sent3: The sectorial focus on education initiatives improved student outcomes in the region.
meanings.sent4: The sectorial collaboration between the two companies led to innovative solutions in the tech industry.
meanings.sent5: The sectorial boundaries were clearly defined to avoid any confusion.
